scripts.cf:create: cloudflared tunnel create deep-diligence 2>&1 | tee /dev/stderr | grep -o '[a-f0-9-]\{36\}' | head -1 | xargs -I {} cp ~/.cloudflared/{}.json ./credentials.json
scripts.cf:credentials: cloudflared tunnel list | grep deep-diligence | awk '{print $1}' | xargs -I {} cp ~/.cloudflared/{}.json ./credentials.json && echo 'Credentials copied to credentials.json'
